All rights reserved. @@ -51,0 +51,1 @@ + private static final String NATIVE_ENCODING; @@ -64,0 +65,1 @@ + NATIVE_ENCODING = getProperty(props, "native.encoding"); @@ -184,0 +186,13 @@ + + /** + * Return the {@code native.encoding} system property. + * + * {@link SecurityManager#checkPropertyAccess} is NOT checked + * in this method. The caller of this method should take care to ensure + * that the returned property is not made accessible to untrusted code. + * + * @return the {@code native.encoding} system property + */ + public static String nativeEncoding() { + return NATIVE_ENCODING; + }
